alert.note: Alert for Goshen County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 2:32PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Scotts Bluff and southeastern Goshen Counties through 315 PM MDT... At 232 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hawk Springs, or 15 miles south of Torrington, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lyman, Huntley and Henry. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM MDT for the Panhandle of Nebraska...and southeastern Wyoming.
